message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll meet you at $108. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $102?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'll meet you at $106. This is my final concession. What do you think?
I understand that you're making a final concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
